conversation_turns.message: Hi, I need to cancel my appointment.
I can help with that. Could you please provide your booking reference?
It's REF123. Can I get a refund if I cancel now?

Yes, according to our policy, you can get a full refund if you cancel at least 24 hours before your appointment. Since your appointment is in 2 days, you are eligible for a full refund. Cancellations within 24 hours are subject to a 50% fee.
